text: Marco Gerhardt van Staden (born ) is a South African rugby union player for the in Super Rugby, the in the Currie Cup and the in the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is flanker. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:People from Krugersdorp Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Blue Bulls players Category:Bulls (rugby union) players Category:South Africa international rugby union players
